strong.a: Click here for 2020-21 school calendar and first day of school

span.br: Learning for a Lifetime - Committed to the Future

div.p: We’re proud to be a district creating innovative programs, serving students and preparing them for college and careers. Our vision is clear: all students are entitled to a successful education; our focus is learning; and we are a team. This vision is shared by our community and we are grateful for the tremendous support we receive, which helps make our schools special places for children to learn. We have strong academic, enrichment and magnet programs and award-winning distinguished schools from transitional kindergarten through high school. Our district is nationally recognized for our work in closing the achievement gap and increasing access to advanced curriculum for all students.
